Four steps #Ukraine conclusions are: (1) Agreement on verification mechanism; (2) Return of border checkpoints to Ukrainian authorities;

The Northern Triangle of Central America seeks to unify actions in favor of migrant children and present a joint proposal to the United States.
The objective is to unify a position on the issue of migration, anticipated the meeting of the three foreign ministers next week in Washington.
We seek to consolidate the efforts so that each consulate in the United States represents the three countries of the Northern Triangle, and not in isolation.
On the economic issue I emphasized that the promotion of extra and intraregional trade should be facilitated and the competitiveness of the region improved
